ClassDecl.Name: GuiGraphicsComposition
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Represents a composition for <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::IGuiGraphicsElement@s:vl.presentation.elements.IGuiGraphicsElement" /></links>. A composition is a way to define the size and the position using the information from graphics elements and sub compositions. When a graphics composition is destroyed, all sub composition will be destroyed. The life cycle of the contained graphics element is partially controlled by the smart pointer to the graphics element inside the composition. </summary> </Document>

EnumItemDecl.Name: LimitToElement
EnumItemDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Minimum size of this composition is the minimum size of the contained graphics element.</summary> </Document>

EnumItemDecl.Name: LimitToElementAndChildren
EnumItemDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Minimum size of this composition is combiniation of sub compositions and the minimum size of the contained graphics element.</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetParent
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the parent composition.</summary> <returns>The parent composition.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Children
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get all child compositions ordered by z-order from low to high.</summary> <returns>Child compositions.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: AddChild
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Add a composition as a child.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="child">The child composition to add.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: InsertChild
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Add a composition as a child with a specified z-order.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="index">The z-order. 0 means the lowest position.</param> <param name="child">The child composition to add.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: RemoveChild
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Remove a child composition.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="child">The child composition to remove.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: MoveChild
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Move a child composition to a new z-order.</summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="child">The child composition to move.</param> <param name="newIndex">The new z-order. 0 means the lowest position.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetOwnedElement
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the contained graphics element.</summary> <returns>The contained graphics element.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetOwnedElement
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the contained graphics element.</summary> <param name="element">The new graphics element to set.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetVisible
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the visibility of the composition.</summary> <returns>Returns true if the composition is visible.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetVisible
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the visibility of the composition.</summary> <param name="value">Set to true to make the composition visible.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetMinSizeLimitation
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the minimum size limitation of the composition.</summary> <returns>The minimum size limitation of the composition.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetMinSizeLimitation
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the minimum size limitation of the composition.</summary> <param name="value">The minimum size limitation of the composition.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRenderTarget
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the binded render target.</summary> <returns>The binded render target.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetRenderTarget
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the binded render target. This function is designed for internal usage. Users are not suggested to call this function directly.</summary> <param name="value">The binded render target.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Render
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Render the composition using an offset.</summary> <param name="offset">The offset.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetEventReceiver
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the event receiver object. All user input events can be found in this object. If an event receiver is never been requested from the composition, the event receiver will not be created, and all route events will not pass through this event receiver(performance will be better).</summary> <returns>The event receiver.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: HasEventReceiver
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Test if any event receiver has already been requested.</summary> <returns>Returns true if any event receiver has already been requested.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: FindComposition
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Find a deepest composition that under a specified location. If the location is inside a compsition but not hit any sub composition, this function will return this composition.</summary> <returns>The deepest composition that under a specified location.</returns> <param name="location">The specified location.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetGlobalBounds
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the bounds in the top composition space.</summary> <returns>The bounds in the top composition space.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetAssociatedControl
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the associated control. A control is associated to a composition only when the composition represents the bounds of this control. Such a composition usually comes from a control template.</summary> <returns>The associated control.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetAssociatedHost
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the associated graphics host. A graphics host is associated to a composition only when the composition becomes the bounds of the graphics host.</summary> <returns>The associated graphics host.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetAssociatedCursor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the associated cursor.</summary> <returns>The associated cursor.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetAssociatedCursor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the associated cursor.</summary> <param name="cursor">The associated cursor.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetAssociatedHitTestResult
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the associated hit test result.</summary> <returns>The associated hit test result.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetAssociatedHitTestResult
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the associated hit test result.</summary> <param name="value">The associated hit test result.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRelatedControl
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the related control. A related control is the deepest control that contains this composition.</summary> <returns>The related control.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRelatedGraphicsHost
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the related graphics host. A related graphics host is the graphics host that contains this composition.</summary> <returns>The related graphics host.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRelatedControlHost
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the related control host. A related control host is the control host that contains this composition.</summary> <returns>The related control host.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRelatedCursor
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the related cursor. A related cursor is from the deepest composition that contains this composition and associated with a cursor.</summary> <returns>The related cursor.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetMargin
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the margin.</summary> <returns>The margin.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetMargin
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the margin.</summary> <param name="value">The margin.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetInternalMargin
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the internal margin.</summary> <returns>The internal margin.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetInternalMargin
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the internal margin.</summary> <param name="value">The internal margin.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetPreferredMinSize
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the preferred minimum size.</summary> <returns>The preferred minimum size.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetPreferredMinSize
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Set the preferred minimum size.</summary> <param name="value">The preferred minimum size.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetClientArea
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the client area.</summary> <returns>The client area.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: ForceCalculateSizeImmediately
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Force to calculate layout and size immediately</summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: IsSizeAffectParent
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Test is the size calculation affected by the parent.</summary> <returns>Returns true if the size calculation is affected by the parent.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetMinPreferredClientSize
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the preferred minimum client size.</summary> <returns>The preferred minimum client size.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetPreferredBounds
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the preferred bounds.</summary> <returns>The preferred bounds.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetBounds
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary>Get the bounds.</summary> <returns>The bounds.</returns> </Document>
